heading: Essential Newborn & Child Care Tips for Parents
content:
Essential Newborn & Child Care Tips for Parents | Expert Advice

As a parent in Ajmer, ensuring your child’s health and development is a top priority. From newborn care to vaccination schedules, here’s a guide to help you navigate the early years—with insights from Dr. Mayur Kumar Goyal, a leading Pediatrician & Neonatologist in Ajmer.

1. Newborn Care: The First 28 Days

The neonatal period is critical for your baby’s health. Dr. Mayur Kumar Goyal, a top neonatologist in Ajmer, shares key tips:

  • Breastfeeding: Exclusive breastfeeding for the first 6 months boosts immunity.
  • Umbilical Cord Care: Keep the area dry and clean to prevent infections.
  • Signs of Jaundice: Yellowish skin/eyes? Consult a child specialist in Ajmer immediately.

2. Vaccination Schedule: Don’t Miss These!

Dr. Goyal’s Mayur Child Care Center follows the IAP-recommended immunization plan:

  • At Birth: BCG, Hepatitis B, OPV.
  • 6 Weeks: Pentavalent, Rotavirus, PCV.
  • 9-12 Months: MMR, Typhoid.

📌 Pro Tip: Book a vaccination consultation to avoid delays.

3. Nutrition for Growing Children

A balanced diet prevents childhood obesity and deficiencies. Dr. Goyal advises:

  • 0-6 Months: Only breast milk/formula.
  • 6+ Months: Introduce mashed fruits, cereals, and pulses.
  • Toddlers: Include proteins, dairy, and iron-rich foods.

4. Recognizing Pediatric Emergencies

When to rush to a 24/7 pediatric hospital in Ajmer:

  • High fever (>101°F) in infants under 3 months.
  • Severe dehydration (no tears, sunken eyes).
  • Breathing difficulties or seizures.

5. Developmental Milestones: Is Your Child on Track?

Regular growth monitoring in Ajmer helps detect delays early. Watch for:

  • By 6 Months: Rolls over, responds to sounds.
  • By 1 Year: Says “mama/dada,” stands with support.
  • By 2 Years: Speaks 2-4 word sentences.

  • 💉 Stress-Free Vaccinations: Gentle techniques for anxious kids.
  • 📱 Online Consultations: Get advice from home.
